description.value:
While you’re in a heightened state, you carry a piercing insight that sees and recalls the most crucial of details. While you have Zeal, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge} checks that you critically succeed against an observed target allow you to grant you and any allies you tell a +1 circumstance bonus to the next attack roll or skill check they make against that target. You can give bonuses from Eremite’s Insight only once per day against a particular creature.

@UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.classes.s5FWiHx2BMlIJ7Af]{Effect: Eremite's Insight}

rules.text: You and any allies you tell gain @UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.classes.s5FWiHx2BMlIJ7Af]{Effect: Eremite's Insight}. You can give bonuses from Eremite’s Insight only once per day against a particular creature.
